A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

$$.value: Pumpkin Taffy
Sweetened pumpkin taffy on a candy cane stick. [Gives +15 Weapon Defense, +15 Magic Defense for 5 minutes]
Red Gummy Slime
Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 1200 HP, 1200 MP]
Green Gummy Slime
Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]
Purple Gummy Slime
Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]
Orange Gummy Slime
Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP, 600 MP]
Maple Pop
A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]
Tae Roon's Note
A small note written by Tae Roon. This note is enchanted, so it boosts weapon attack and magic attack by 3 for 1 minute.
Mushroom Candy
Delicious mushroom candy from Sen. This candy makes anyone feel good about themselves. So good, that it boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.
Pumpkin Pieces
Pieces of pumpkin left over from making Halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. The pumpkin, perfectly ripe, has an aroma that is sweeter than ever. Each piece recovers 50 HP and 50 MP.
Halloween Candy
A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.
Power of the Glowing Rock
Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.
Coconut Juice
A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.
Attack Crystal
A red crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Attack +5 for 5 minutes.
Accuracy Crystal
A blue crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Accuracy +5 for 5 minutes.
Stuffing Scoop
A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold.\n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]
Cranberry Sauce
This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal!\n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]
Mashed Potato
It looks like someone dropped this potato.\n[Restores 800 HP]
Gravy
The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train.\n[Restores 800 MP]
Snowing Fishbread
Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.
Power Punch
A fist used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts weapon and magic attack.
Wing of the Wind
A set of wings used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts speed and jump.
Crazy Skull
An eyeball-rotating skull used during the Hunting Tournament. Inverts directions.
Shield
A shield used during the Hunting Tournament. Protects the owner from the bomb once.
Maplemas Ham
A delicious-looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.
Smoken Salmon
The traditional Versalmas dinner. Smells... like fish.\nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.
Ssiws Cheese
Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal. Looks funny but smells quite nice.\nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes
Sugar-Coated Olives
Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal!\nGives +40 Speed and +25 Jump for 5 minutes.
Caramel Onion
O-Pongo's favorite treat! Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center!\nRestores 800 HP and MP.
Chocolate Wafers
A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme.\nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes
Sunblock
SPF 1000. Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones.\nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.
Lump of Coal
Restores 1 HP and 1 MP.
Snow Cake Piece
A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.
A Flurry of Snow
Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.
Chinese Firecrackers
A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.
Naricain's Demon Elixir
A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed.\n[Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]
Subani's Mystic Cauldron
Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura.\n[Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]
Barricade Booster
John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies!\n[Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]
Sweet Heart
Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.
Power Scream
A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.
Party Bear
Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.
Taru Face Paint
This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]
Primal Brew
A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit.\n[Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]
Spirit Herbs
Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit.\n[Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]
Jungle Juice
A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek!\n[Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]
Treasure Hunt Note
Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.
Chocolate Cream Cupcake
A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]
Big Cream Puff
A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]
Agent O's Encouragement
An encouraging message from Agent O. Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.
Agent O's Encouragement
An encouraging message from Agent O. Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.
Baby Chick Cookie
This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.
Secret Box
Secret Box
Sorcerer's Potion
This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.
VitroJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]
NitroJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]
BlastroJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +90 Weapon Attack for 1 minute]
ElectroJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]
MegaJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]
GigaJuice
A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery! Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]
JigaJuice

A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Drink at your own risk! Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]
The Energizer Drink
An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30
Tick-Tock's Egg
This is Tick-Tock's egg. There must be something inside.
Cronos' Egg
This is Cronos' egg. There must be something inside.
Holiday Buff
A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Jump +5.
Holiday Buff
A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed +7.
Holiday Buff
A Holiday present from the Snow Spirit. For 15 min., Speed and Jump +10.
Elixir of Darkness
A mysterious concoction of herbs brewed deep within the mountains of El Nath. [Gives +200 Magic Attack, -25 Defense for 5 minutes.]
Gold Dust
Ancient dust found long ago by the miners in El Nath. [Gives +20 Defense for 5 minutes.]
Adonis Cauldron
A rather clumsy attempt at potion creation by Adonis. Still useful in the hands of a skilled warrior. [Gives +40 Weapon Attack, +50 Avoidability, -30 Defense for 10 minutes.]
Fireworks
The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.
Mihile's Blessing
Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Oz's Blessing
Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Irena's Blessing
Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Eckhart's Blessing
Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Hawkeye's Blessing
Once I used the 'Torn Cygnus' Book', a mysterious power covered me and blessed me.
Pink Bean Squad : Victory
Weapon Attack +35, Magic Attack +45, Weapon Defense +250, Magic Defense +250 for one hour.
Fireworks
The fireworks for celebrating MV's defeat. Speed +5, Physical & Magic Attack +5 for 20 min.
Cygnus's Blessing
Once I completed Cygnus' Book, the spirit's power covered me and blessed me. It increased my Attack Rate by 10, Physical Defense Rate by 80 and Speed by 5 for 10 minutes.
Red Easter Egg
A freshly boiled egg colored in red. Recovers 400 HP and MP.
Return Scroll - Nearest Town
Returns you to the closest town from where you are. Once used, it disappears.
Return Scroll to Lith Harbor
Returns you to Lith Harbor. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Ellinia
Returns you to Ellinia. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Perion
Returns you to Perion. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Henesys
Returns you to Henesys, the peaceful town. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Kerning City
Returns you to the dark Kerning City. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Sleepywood
Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town. It disappears once it's used.
Return Scroll to Dead Mine
Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath. It disappears once it's used.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.
Coffee Milk
Returns you to the nearest town.
Strawberry Milk
Returns you to Mushroom Shrine.
Fruit Milk
Returns you to Showa Town.
Command Center Warp Capsule
A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.
Ludibrium Warp Capsule
A warp capsule that returns you to Ludibrium.
Phyllia's Warp Powder
Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.
Return Scroll to Nautilus
This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one-use item and will disappear after use.
Return Scroll - Banished Area
Returns you to the map where you were last banished. Requires immediate use and have changed neither maps nor channels.
Masked Man's Invitation
An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.
Studio Invitation
An invitation to the studio for the event "For Guild Only".

Ghost Candy
A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.
Sophillia's Abandoned Doll
An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.
Potion of Transformation
The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.
Potion of Transformation
The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.
Change to Mouse
Transform into a small, tiny mouse.
Mini Draco Transformation
The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.
Cody's Picture
A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.
Cake Picture
A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny will happen when I use it.
Cliff's Special Potion
No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...
Maplemas Party Potion
Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!
Moonstone Engagement Ring Box
Engagement Ring made of Moon Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.
Star gem Engagement Ring Box
Engagement Ring made of Star Rock. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.
Golden Heart Engagement Ring Box
Engagement Ring made of gold. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.
Silver Swan Engagement Ring Box
Engagement Ring made of silver. The ring will be inside a wrapped box. Required for proposal.
Revitalizer
Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.
Pheromone Perfume
A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.
Pouch
A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.
Element Rock
A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.
Cliff's Magic Cane
A magic cane that tames the lost Rudolph.
Purification Marble
It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.
1st Transparent Marble
A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.
2nd Transparent Marble
A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.
3rd Transparent Marble
A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.
Lava Bottle
A glass bottle that contains actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.
Black Cloud Machine
A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.
Firm Hand
A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

Ancient Ice Powder
This is a pack full of ancient ice powder. If you eat this, you will feel chilled and can learn Ice Demon.
[Skill Book] Rush
You can learn #cRush# with this book.\nJob: 4th Advancement Warrior.\nCondition : #cRush# not acquired.
The Owl of Minerva
#cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.
Teleport Rock

Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

White Scroll

One of Subani's sacred scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

The Songs of Solomon

An ancient collection of poems and life lessons from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 100,000 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.
The Stories of Solomon

An ancient book of stories, fables and other myths from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 50,000 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.
The Travels of Solomon

An ancient collection of map routes, hidden paths and shortcuts from various elders, sages and warriors in the Maple World. Reading this allows one to gain their collective experience (EXP) in a single second. This edition provides 30,000 EXP. Only available for users under Level 51.
